name: Arbiter: The Conspiracy
description:
NOTE: This is my entry for the Game Mockup Jam.  As such, this page is the end product and doesn't actually include any game with it.

As you have no doubt surmised, there has been an incident.  The nature of the incident is still unknown, but of such import and delicacy that we must involve help outside our circle.
          - Minister of Security

On the world of Larsa, government has been  overseen by the enigmatic Chancellor for decades. Strange things have been happening recently, though.  The Chancellor's Ministers have asked you to investigate what is going on.

Key Features:
  • Top-down melee and ranged combat
  • Two unique player augmentation paths
  • Light and Location based stealth system
  • Deep story
  • Grid-style inventory system
Credits:

World creation and expert consultation: D E Towry

Pixel art and game design: JC Sirron
